name: Marty
text:
Super restaurant!!  Amazing staff; they were ALL super friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. Perfect!  Great craft cocktails with fresh juices and syrups.
I loved that EVERY SINGLE PERSON in front and in the kitchen had a mask on to ‚Ä¶More

name: KJ T
text: The pizza was delicious... Only thing was i didn't get thin crust like i asked for and it wasn't ready at the time it told me... Customer service was great also... I'll probably visit again

name: Dennis Hughes
text: Great pizza place. Really enjoy sitting outside with our dog.

name: paige barton
text:
Pizzas we ordered yesterday via UberEats was absolutely delicious!
Pepperoni placement and perfect amount of cheese!
Thank you, we will order from this location again!

name: Barbie Cockrell
text: Terrific service, delicious food!  It was a great place to celebrate our daughters 12th birthday.  Our waitress was phenomenal!

name: Vaporlocked
text: Mellow mushroom goodness in bustling Woodstock!  It's always a very busy place on Friday and Saturday evenings, worse with Covid seating restrictions but the food was delicious as ever!

name: genan7891
text: Good food, good service. Reasonably priced.

name: Greg Chatham
text: We love the pizza (house pizza) with a salad. They have out door seating which these days can be a game changer.

name: Nate E
text: Always fresh and tasty. Salads are amazing and best pizza in town. Wait staff at this location are always fantastic.

name: Beth girl
text: Good pizza and drink options. Great place for families or groups of friends. Casual dining and friendly service. I specifically asked to come here when visiting my brother since it was so good last time!

name: Lora Schenderlein
text: Great food tonight. Not crowded and keeping with guideline keeping everyone safe.

name: Lorraine Thompson
text: I wasn't sure what to expect during this time but they pulled it off. Clean and managed spaces, great atmosphere and pizza is still incredible! Nice work!

name: Amanda Mariah
text: The best pizza. Jenna is so great!! My new favorite spot

name: Sue Keppel
text: The bill seemed really high for what we had. Service was good and we felt safe on the patio

name: Yelizaveta Utkina
text: Nicest Mellow Mushroom I've been to. Very clean bathrooms.

name: Sunnie Wallace
text: Great service.  Great place for kids. I usually get the Holy Shitake Pie, it is heavenly!! My kids always love their pizzas, love the big cheesy STRETCH they get when they take a bite. My only knock is the BBQ wings.  They were cooked well ‚Ä¶More

name: Gretchan Cowan
text: Restaurant had a strong smoky smell which really bothered my elderly mother. Pizza was ok but the dough was really soggy.

name: Michael Brooks
text: The pizza is ok, wasn't worth the price in my opinion. The cheese bread was great. The bottom of  both pizzas ordered were over cooked. The waitress was friendly and quick to answer questions and professional.

name: Augie Olsen
text: Great sandwiches, good selection of beer at fair prices.

name: Andrea Porubiansky
text: The best gluten free pizza around. Try the holy shitake!! Love it!

name: Mark Palovick
text: This was our 2nd time at this Mellow location and again it‚Äôs great!  Lydia was our server each time and was a 10/10...we‚Äôll be back!

name: Michael Parham
text: Very much enjoyed a dinner date with my valentine. Hippie vibes galore, something we both appreciate. We both loved our pizza. Delicious gluten free options as well.

name: Ally Boyd
text: Kevin, our pizza maker you are the real MVP! It is valentines and this quite possibly was the best pizza we have ever had, and on top of that it is in the shape of a heart (which they do not do) we requested it for tonight. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim Rascoe
text: If you go into the restaurant, the pizza is great! If you try to call a pizza in to go, you can forget it! On hold Forever! My husband finally just went up there and it‚Äôs not even busy! Run by kids with poor management is all I can figure!üôÑ

name: Ben Harvey
text: Great food, as always! Lydia was awesome!

name: Justin Branam
text: I asked for my pie to be crispy and it was perfect. I love the draft beer selection. We had a dude serving us. He was so polite and made us laugh a few times. I appreciate how low pressure it is and just how chill itnis to visit. Go get you some Pizza !

name: Parker Johnson
text: Mellow Mushroom makes the best pizza that I've ever had. The dough they use is absolutely incredible. It's very chewy, buttery, and delicious. Their prices are a bit high, but for such quality pizza I can't complain!

name: Roberto Miranda
text: Great pizza and friendly service.

name: Mama Vaughn
text: One of our favorite places! Fantastic pizza, excellent service, family friendly!

name: giovanni aragon
text: Took my family for dinner and everyone was happy

name: Cristina Caro
text: Visited here for weekend lunch & tried the HOLY SHIITAKE PIE. It was great.

name: Arlene T
text: Service was fast, efficient and friendly. Food was fresh, flavorful and creative yet uncomplicated, original and delicious! We had the bruschetta which was beautiful.  Made very traditionally so the basil was fresh and abundant. I can't ‚Ä¶More

name: Audrey Jarrett
text: Great pizza, great staff, great bartender, go often and definitely recommend. Small but decent selection of draft beers. Will make any of their awesome pizzas in thin crust for you. Cool atmosphere, as mellow always is ‚úåÔ∏èüòÑ

name: Ben Sommer
text: The salads were great, large and had alot of choices.  Subs are super awesome too and the calzones.  Large portion sizes.

name: Franklin Pietraszuk
text: Wonderful pizza.

name: Steve Zissou
text: The pizza is always consistent and on point. Fine in service at this location has always been solid as well. I eat here once a month or so and highly recommend the Buffalo chicken pizza.

text: Excellent pizza but horrible service! Seems like this restaurant is run by a bunch of kids

text:
I don't understand why there's so much Grease/oil

name: Peter Shir
text: I have been coming to this restaurant for many years. Its not the hippie decor or the music from the days gone by. Its the menu choices and some of the tastiest pizza in town. A nice selection of beer on tap is also a welcome addition, a ‚Ä¶More

text: Service was good. Food was good. Seated right away.

name: Bette Fitzpatrick
text: Geat Pizza! Drive 40 minutes to eat there.

name: Vincent Jenks
text: Moved into the neighborhood a few months ago, and was initially a little bummed by the quality at this location. They have since stepped up their game! Service is fantastic! Friendly, fast, and fun. Quality of the pizza is excellent! Always kinda messy, outside and in, and could use some regular doing and cleanup, but overall very good.

name: robbin wemyss
text: Great pepperoni mushroom onion pizza

name: M P
text: It's alright. A bit overpriced for what they offer. The staff didn't really care about getting our order right; we had to send it back twice. Pizza is okay, other Mellow mushroom locations have better staff and better made food.

text: Just picked up a to-go pizza and it‚Äôs the prettiest pizza I‚Äôve ever seen. By far my favourite pizza spot in Towne Lake. text: Food is good but overpriced.  I ask for either specials or coupons when I place an order and there never are any.  They send off a $3.00 off coupon ( not that much off) with delivery but will not allow you to use it on that purchase.  Wish there were better deals for families.
